metadata.titleEn: Dataset of Heihe integrated observatory network: Cosmic-ray observation system of soil moisture of Daman Superstation, 2022
metadata.titleCn: 黑河流域地表过程综合观测网：大满超级站宇宙射线观测系统（2022）
metadata.description:
This dataset includes data recorded by the Heihe integrated observatory network obtained from a Cosmic-ray Soil Moisture Observing System of soil moisture of Daman Superstation from January 1 to December 31, 2022. The site (100.372° E, 38.856° N) was located on a cropland (maize surface) in the Daman irrigation, which is near Zhangye city, Gansu Province. The elevation is 1556 m. The bottom of the probe was 0.5 m above the ground; the sampling interval was 1 hour.
The raw COSMOS data include the following: battery (Batt, V), temperature (T, C), relative humidity (RH, %), air pressure (P, hPa), fast neutron counts (N1C, counts per hour), thermal neutron counts (N2C, counts per hour), sample time of fast neutrons (N1ET, s), and sample time of thermal neutrons (N2ET, s). The distributed data include the following variables: Date, Time, P, N1C, N1C_cor (corrected fast neutron counts) and VWC (volume soil moisture, %), which were processed as follows:
1) Data were removed and replaced by -6999 when (a) the battery voltage was less than 11.8 V, (b) the relative humidity was greater than 80% inside the probe box, (c) the counting data were not of one-hour duration and (d) neutron count differed from the previous value by more than 20%; 2) An air pressure correction was applied to the quality-controlled raw data according to the equation contained in the equipment manual; 3) After the quality control and corrections were applied, soil moisture was calculated using the equation in Zreda et al. (2012), where N0 is the neutron counts above dry soil and the other variables are fitted constants that define the shape of the calibration function. Here, the parameter N0 was calibrated using the in situ observed soil moisture by SoilNET within the footprint; 4) Based on the calibrated N0 and corrected N1C, the hourly soil moisture was computed using the equation from the equipment manual. Moreover, suspicious data were marked in red.
For more information, please refer to Liu et al. (2018) (for sites information), Zhu et al. (2015) for data processing) in the Citation section.
metadata.descriptionCn:
该数据集包含了2022年1月1日至2022年12月31日黑河流域地表过程综合观测网中游大满超级站宇宙射线观测系统数据。站点位于甘肃省张掖市大满灌区农田内，下垫面是玉米田。观测点的经纬度是100.372° E, 38.856° N，海拔1556m。仪器探头底部距地面0.5m，采样频率是1小时。
宇宙射线仪器的原始观测项目包括：电压Batt（V）、温度T（℃）、相对湿度RH（%）、气压P（hPa）、快中子数N1C（个/小时）、热中子数N2C（个/小时）、快中子采样时间N1ET（s）及热中子采样时间N2ET（s）。发布的数据为经过处理计算后的数据，数据表头包括：Date Time（日期 时间）、P（气压 hPa）、N1C（快中子数 个/小时）、N1C_cor（气压订正的快中子数 个/小时）和VWC（土壤体积含水量 %），其处理的主要步骤包括：
1）	数据筛选
数据筛选共四条标准：（1）剔除电压小于和等于11.8伏特的数据；（2）剔除空气相对湿度大于和等于80%的数据；（3）剔除采样时间间隔不在60±1分钟内的数据；（4） 剔除快中子数较前后一小时变化大于200的数据。剔除及缺失数据用-6999补充。
2）	气压订正
根据仪器说明手册中提到的快中子气压订正公式，对原始数据进行气压订正，得到订正后的快中子数N1C_cor。
3）	仪器率定
在计算土壤水分的过程中需要对计算公式中的N0进行率定。N0为土壤干燥条件下的快中子数，通常使用测量源区内的土样得到实测土壤水分（或者通过比较密集的土壤水分无线传感器获取）θm（Zreda et al. 2012）和对应时间段内的快中子校正数据N，再通过公式反求得到N0。
黑河综合观测网或站点信息请参考Liu et al. (2018)，观测数据处理请参考Zhu et al. (2015)。

background: Arid and semiarid regions represent approximately 30 % of the global terrestrial surface area (Dregne, 1991; Scanlon et al., 2006), and dryland expansion occurs under climate change, especially in developing countries (Huang et al., 2016). An oasis is a unique ecological landscape in arid and semi-arid areas that is not only the core of regions’ ecological environment but also the foundation of their economic development, especially in western China, which has been an important part of the “Silk Road” since ancient times. Oases comprising less than 10 % of the total area of arid regions support more than 90 % of the population in these regions of China (Chu et al., 2005; Li et al., 2016; Zhou et al., 2022). The oasis–desert system plays a crucial role in maintaining a stable ecological environment and agricultural productivity (Zhang and Zhao, 2015). Extensive studies have investigated energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis–desert areas based on field and remote-sensing observations (Taha et al., 1991; Potchter et al., 2008; Xue et al., 2019; Wang et al., 2019; Zhou et al., 2022) and numerical simulations (Chu et al., 2005; Meng et al., 2009; Georgescu et al., 2011; Liu et al., 2020). In addition, oasis–desert areas located in semiarid regions have been found to be carbon sinks by previous researchers (Tagesson et al., 2016; Wang et al., 2019); thus, they can significantly affect the carbon balance of arid regions and play an increasingly important role within the global carbon cycle.
research objective: Therefore, it is critical to maintain the balance between oasis and desert systems in order to achieve the goal of sustainable oasis development. Understanding the basic characteristics of energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis–desert ecosystems is important to achieve the goals of carbon peaking and carbon neutrality in the oasis–desert area and support the ecological security and sustainable development of the oasis. A quantitative understanding of the energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis–desert areas is crucial to recognize the oasis–desert interactions and is significant to protect the ecological stability and socioeconomic development of oases; moreover, long-term observations are indispensable.
challenges: Inland river basins in arid and semiarid areas are facing the crisis of ecological environment degradation, such as the drying up of rivers and lakes, the degradation of natural vegetation, the intensification of land desertification, and the frequent occurrence of dust storms, especially in many inland river basins westward along the Silk Road, such as the Tarim River basin (Zhao et al., 2013), the Aral Sea basin (Stanev et al., 2004; Crétaux et al., 2009), and the Lake Urmia basin (Stone, 2015).
methods: In this study, we present a suite of observational datasets from artificial and natural oasis–desert systems that consist of long-term energy, water vapor, carbon and methane fluxes as well as auxiliary data involving hydrometeorology, vegetation, and soil parameters from 2012 to 2021. Half-hourly turbulent flux data were acquired by an eddy covariance system and scintillometer. The hydrometeorological data (including radiation, soil heat flux, and soil temperature profiles; gradients of air temperature and humidity and of wind speed and direction; and air pressure, precipitation, and soil moisture profiles) were observed from automatic weather stations with a 10 min average period as well as the groundwater table data. Moreover, vegetation and soil parameters were also supplemented in the datasets. The data processing and quality control procedure can be divided into data collection, data processing, and data archiving and sharing.
dataset: The study area comprises the middle and lower reaches of the HRB, located in the arid regions of western China, that receive water from the typical cryosphere of the upper reaches. A total of 11 land surface flux and meteorological stations have been established in these regions since 2012 – 2 superstations and 9 ordinary stations. The dataset of energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange observations in oasis–desert areas reported in this study (including energy, water vapor, and carbon fluxes; hydrometeorological data; and vegetation and soil parameters) is freely available from the National Tibetan Plateau Data Center.
backgroundCn: 干旱和半干旱地区约占全球陆地表面积的30%（Dregne, 1991；Scanlon et al., 2006），在气候变化的影响下，干旱地区的扩展尤其发生在发展中国家（Huang et al., 2016）。绿洲是干旱和半干旱地区独特的生态景观，不仅是这些地区生态环境的核心，也是经济发展的基础，特别是在中国西部，自古以来就一直是“丝绸之路”的重要组成部分。绿洲占干旱地区总面积的不到10%，却支持了中国这些地区90%以上的人口（Chu et al., 2005；Li et al., 2016；Zhou et al., 2022）。绿洲-沙漠系统在维持稳定的生态环境和农业生产力方面发挥着至关重要的作用（Zhang and Zhao, 2015）。大量研究基于实地和遥感观测（Taha et al., 1991；Potchter et al., 2008；Xue et al., 2019；Wang et al., 2019；Zhou et al., 2022）以及数值模拟（Chu et al., 2005；Meng et al., 2009；Georgescu et al., 2011；Liu et al., 2020）对绿洲-沙漠地区的能量、水汽和碳交换进行了广泛研究。此外，位于半干旱地区的绿洲-沙漠地区已被前期研究者发现是碳汇（Tagesson et al., 2016；Wang et al., 2019）；因此，它们可以显著影响干旱地区的碳平衡，并在全球碳循环中发挥越来越重要的作用。
research objectiveCn: 因此，维持绿洲与沙漠系统之间的平衡对于实现可持续绿洲发展的目标至关重要。了解绿洲-沙漠生态系统中能量、水汽和碳交换的基本特征，对于实现绿洲-沙漠地区的碳达峰和碳中和目标，以及支持绿洲的生态安全和可持续发展是非常重要的。对绿洲-沙漠地区能量、水汽和碳交换的定量理解，对于认识绿洲-沙漠之间的相互作用至关重要，并且对保护生态稳定性和绿洲的社会经济发展具有重要意义；此外，长期观测是不可或缺的。
challengesCn: 内陆河流流域在干旱和半干旱地区面临生态环境退化的危机，例如河流和湖泊干涸、自然植被退化、土地沙漠化加剧以及沙尘暴频发，尤其是在丝绸之路沿线的许多内陆河流流域，如塔里木河流域（赵等，2013），阿拉尔海流域（斯坦耶夫等，2004；克雷托等，2009）和乌尔米湖流域（斯通，2015）。
methodsCn: 在本研究中，我们呈现了一套来自人工和自然绿洲–沙漠系统的观测数据集，包括2012年至2021年的长期能量、水蒸气、碳和甲烷通量，以及涉及水文气象、植被和土壤参数的辅助数据。半小时的湍流通量数据是通过涡度协方差系统和闪烁仪获取的。水文气象数据（包括辐射、土壤热通量和土壤温度剖面；空气温度和湿度的梯度、风速和风向的梯度；以及气压、降水和土壤湿度剖面）是通过自动气象站以10分钟的平均周期观测的，同时也包括地下水位数据。此外，数据集中还补充了植被和土壤参数。数据处理和质量控制程序可以分为数据收集、数据处理和数据归档与共享。
datasetCn: 研究区域包括位于中国西部干旱地区的HRB中下游，水源来自上游典型的冰冻圈。自2012年以来，在这些地区建立了11个地表通量和气象站，包括2个超级站和9个普通站。本研究报告的绿洲-沙漠地区能量、水汽和碳交换观测数据集（包括能量、水汽和碳通量；水文气象数据；以及植被和土壤参数）可从国家西藏高原数据中心免费获取。

Verification.QuestionEn: Does the data collection method for cosmic ray observation systems include steps for data screening and correction?
Verification.QuestionCn: 宇宙射线观测系统的数据收集方法是否包括数据筛选和修正的步骤？

Verification.QuestionEn: Is there a dataset available that includes energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange observations in oasis–desert areas?
Verification.QuestionCn: 是否有可用的数据集，包括绿洲-沙漠地区的能量、水汽和碳交换观测数据？

Disjunctive.QuestionEn: Is the primary data collection method for studying oasis–desert systems based on field observations, remote sensing, or numerical simulations?
Disjunctive.QuestionCn: 研究绿洲-沙漠系统的主要数据收集方法是基于实地观察、遥感还是数值模拟？
Disjunctive.AnswerEn: field observations, remote sensing, numerical simulations
Disjunctive.AnswerCn: 现场观测、遥感、数值模拟

Disjunctive.QuestionEn: Are datasets on energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis–desert areas more commonly supplemented with hydrometeorological data, vegetation data, or soil parameters?
Disjunctive.QuestionCn: 在绿洲-沙漠地区，关于能量、水汽和碳交换的数据集更常与水文气象数据、植被数据还是土壤参数进行补充？

Concept Completion.QuestionEn: What are the main criteria used for data screening in the collection of cosmic ray data in arid regions?
Concept Completion.QuestionCn: 在干旱地区收集宇宙射线数据时，数据筛选的主要标准是什么？
Concept Completion.AnswerEn: voltage less than or equal to 11.8 volts, relative humidity greater than or equal to 80%, sampling intervals not within 60±1 minutes, fast neutron counts vary by more than 200 compared to the previous or subsequent hour
Concept Completion.AnswerCn: 电压小于或等于11.8伏，相对湿度大于或等于80%，采样间隔不在60±1分钟内，快中子计数与前一小时或后一小时相比变化超过200。

Concept Completion.QuestionEn: Where is the cosmic ray observation system located for collecting data on surface processes in the Heihe River Basin?
Concept Completion.QuestionCn: 用于收集黑河流域表面过程数据的宇宙射线观测系统位于哪里？
Concept Completion.AnswerEn: Daman irrigation area farmland, Zhangye City, Gansu Province, China
Concept Completion.AnswerCn: 甘肃省张掖市大满灌区农田

Concept Completion.QuestionEn: What methods are used for instrument calibration when calculating soil moisture using cosmic ray data?
Concept Completion.QuestionCn: 在使用宇宙射线数据计算土壤湿度时，采用了哪些仪器校准方法？

Example.QuestionEn: Can you provide an example of a data collection method used to measure soil moisture in oasis–desert ecosystems?
Example.QuestionCn: 您能否提供一个用于测量绿洲-沙漠生态系统土壤湿度的数据收集方法的例子？
Example.AnswerEn: One example is the use of cosmic ray neutron sensing at a superstation site, where the data is collected by measuring fast and thermal neutron counts, which are then calibrated to determine soil moisture content. This method involves data screening, pressure correction, and instrument calibration steps to ensure accuracy.
Example.AnswerCn: 一个例子是在超级站点使用宇宙射线中子传感技术，通过测量快中子和热中子的计数来收集数据，然后进行校准以确定土壤湿度含量。这种方法涉及数据筛选、压力修正和仪器校准步骤，以确保准确性。

Example.QuestionEn: What is an example of a challenge faced in collecting long-term hydrometeorological data in arid regions?
Example.QuestionCn: 在干旱地区收集长期水文气象数据时面临的一个挑战是什么？
Example.AnswerEn: A significant challenge is the degradation of the ecological environment, such as drying rivers and increased land desertification, which can complicate the maintenance and accuracy of long-term data collection from automatic weather stations in arid regions.
Example.AnswerCn: 一个重大挑战是生态环境的恶化，例如河流干涸和土地沙漠化加剧，这可能会使在干旱地区自动气象站的长期数据收集的维护和准确性变得复杂。

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What are the key characteristics of data collection methods used for measuring cosmic ray observations in agricultural settings?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 用于在农业环境中测量宇宙射线观测的数据收集方法的关键特征是什么？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: cosmic ray sensors, 0.5m above the ground, 1 hour sampling frequency, voltage, temperature, relative humidity, air pressure, neutron counts, sampling times
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 宇宙射线传感器，距离地面0.5米，1小时采样频率，电压，温度，相对湿度，气压，中子计数，采样时间。

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What are the primary challenges in collecting hydrometeorological data in arid and semiarid regions?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 在干旱和半干旱地区收集水文气象数据的主要挑战是什么？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: ecological degradation, river and lake drying, natural vegetation degradation, increased land desertification, frequent dust storms
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 生态退化、河流和湖泊干涸、自然植被退化、土地沙漠化加剧、频繁的沙尘暴。

Quantification.QuestionEn: How many land surface flux and meteorological stations have been established in the middle and lower reaches of the HRB since 2012?
Quantification.QuestionCn: 自2012年以来，在HRB的中下游地区建立了多少个陆面通量和气象站？

Quantification.QuestionEn: What is the maximum air relative humidity threshold used for data filtering in the cosmic ray observation system?
Quantification.QuestionCn: 在宇宙射线观测系统中，用于数据过滤的最大空气相对湿度阈值是多少？

Quantification.QuestionEn: What is the sampling frequency of the cosmic ray observation data collected at the Daman Superstation?
Quantification.QuestionCn: 在达曼超级站收集的宇宙射线观测数据的采样频率是多少？

Definition.QuestionEn: What is the definition of a 'superstation' in the context of land surface flux and meteorological observations?
Definition.QuestionCn: 在土地表面通量和气象观测的背景下，“超级站”的定义是什么？
Definition.AnswerEn: A 'superstation' refers to a comprehensive observation site within a network of land surface flux and meteorological stations that typically includes a wide array of instruments and sensors to measure various environmental parameters. In the context provided, it is a part of a network of 11 stations in the Heihe River Basin, which includes 2 superstations for detailed and extensive data collection.
Definition.AnswerCn: “超级站”是指在一个陆地表面通量和气象站网络中的综合观测站，通常包括多种仪器和传感器，用于测量各种环境参数。在所提供的背景中，它是黑河流域11个站点网络的一部分，其中包括2个超级站，以进行详细和广泛的数据收集。

Definition.QuestionEn: What does 'cosmic ray observation system' mean in the context of environmental monitoring?
Definition.QuestionCn: 在环境监测的背景下，“宇宙射线观测系统”指的是用于检测和分析宇宙射线的系统，这些宇宙射线是来自宇宙的高能粒子。该系统可以帮助研究宇宙射线对地球环境和生物的影响，以及它们在气候变化和大气物理学中的作用。
Definition.AnswerEn: A 'cosmic ray observation system' in environmental monitoring refers to an instrument setup used to measure cosmic ray neutrons to infer environmental variables such as soil moisture. In the context provided, the system at a superstation measures parameters like voltage, temperature, relative humidity, pressure, and neutron counts, which are used to derive soil volumetric water content.
Definition.AnswerCn: “宇宙射线观测系统”在环境监测中指的是一种仪器设置，用于测量宇宙射线中子，以推断环境变量，如土壤湿度。在提供的背景中，超级站的系统测量电压、温度、相对湿度、压力和中子计数等参数，这些参数用于推导土壤体积含水量。

Definition.QuestionEn: What is meant by 'pressure correction' in the analysis of cosmic ray neutron data?
Definition.QuestionCn: 在宇宙射线中子数据分析中，“压力修正”是指对因气压变化而导致的中子计数率变化进行调整的过程。
Definition.AnswerEn: 'Pressure correction' in the analysis of cosmic ray neutron data refers to the adjustment of neutron counts to account for atmospheric pressure variations. This correction is essential because changes in pressure affect the neutron count readings. The pressure-corrected neutron counts provide more accurate data for calculating soil moisture, as described in the data processing methods of the cosmic ray observation system.
Definition.AnswerCn: “压力修正”在宇宙射线中子数据分析中是指对中子计数进行调整，以考虑大气压力变化的影响。这一修正是必需的，因为压力变化会影响中子计数读数。经过压力修正的中子计数提供了更准确的数据，用于计算土壤湿度，如宇宙射线观测系统的数据处理方法所述。

Comparison.QuestionEn: What are the differences in data processing and quality control procedures between a dataset involving cosmic ray neutron data and another involving hydrometeorological data from artificial and natural oasis–desert systems?
Comparison.QuestionCn: 涉及宇宙射线中子数据的数据库与涉及人工和自然绿洲–沙漠系统的水文气象数据的数据库在数据处理和质量控制程序方面有什么区别？
Comparison.AnswerEn: The data processing for cosmic ray neutron datasets involves specific steps such as voltage and humidity data filtering, pressure correction, and calibration for soil moisture calculation. In contrast, datasets from oasis–desert systems use a broader range of data, including energy, water vapor, carbon fluxes, and hydrometeorological observations, requiring different quality control measures like data collection, processing, and archiving, emphasizing the integration of various environmental parameters.
Comparison.AnswerCn: 宇宙射线中子数据集的数据处理涉及特定步骤，如电压和湿度数据过滤、压力校正以及土壤湿度计算的校准。相比之下，来自绿洲-沙漠系统的数据集使用更广泛的数据，包括能量、水蒸气、碳通量和水文气象观测，要求不同的质量控制措施，如数据收集、处理和归档，强调各种环境参数的整合。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: What challenges are inherent in collecting high-frequency neutron and meteorological data in oasis-desert ecosystems, and how might these affect data interpretation?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 在绿洲-沙漠生态系统中收集高频中子和气象数据固有的挑战有哪些，这些挑战可能如何影响数据解释？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: Challenges include environmental degradation factors like drying rivers and desertification, which can impact data accuracy. Additionally, instrument sensitivity to voltage, humidity, and time intervals can lead to data exclusion, potentially affecting interpretations of oasis-desert interactions and the ecological stability of these areas.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 挑战包括环境退化因素，如河流干涸和沙漠化，这可能影响数据的准确性。此外，仪器对电压、湿度和时间间隔的敏感性可能导致数据排除，从而可能影响对绿洲-沙漠相互作用和这些地区生态稳定性的解释。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: In what ways can long-term observational datasets of energy, water vapor, and carbon fluxes enhance the understanding of oasis–desert ecosystem interactions?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 长期观测的能量、水汽和碳通量数据集可以通过以下方式增强对绿洲-沙漠生态系统相互作用的理解：
Interpretation.AnswerEn: Long-term datasets provide comprehensive insights into the interactions between energy, water vapor, and carbon fluxes. These datasets, obtained through techniques like eddy covariance and scintillometer measurements, help quantify the balance of these elements, informing sustainable development and ecological security strategies for maintaining oasis–desert systems.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 长期数据集提供了关于能量、水蒸气和碳通量之间相互作用的全面见解。这些数据集通过涡度协方差和闪烁仪测量等技术获得，有助于量化这些元素的平衡，为维持绿洲-沙漠系统的可持续发展和生态安全策略提供信息。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What causes the need for pressure correction in the data collected by cosmic ray instruments in agricultural fields?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 导致农业领域宇宙射线仪器收集的数据需要进行压力修正的原因是什么？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: Pressure correction is needed due to the influence of atmospheric pressure on the measurement of fast neutrons by cosmic ray instruments. The correction ensures that the neutron count is accurate and reflects the actual environmental conditions, compensating for variations caused by changes in pressure.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 压力修正是由于大气压力对宇宙射线仪器测量快中子的影响而需要的。该修正确保中子计数准确，反映实际环境条件，补偿因压力变化引起的变化。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What are the underlying reasons for the challenges faced in maintaining ecological stability in oasis-desert systems?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 维持绿洲-沙漠系统生态稳定性所面临的挑战的根本原因是什么？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: The challenges in maintaining ecological stability in oasis-desert systems are primarily due to environmental degradation, such as river and lake drying, vegetation degradation, land desertification, and frequent dust storms. These issues are exacerbated by the fragile ecological balance in arid regions and the critical role of oases in supporting the local population and economy.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 维持绿洲-沙漠系统生态稳定的挑战主要源于环境退化，如河流和湖泊干涸、植被退化、土地沙漠化以及频繁的沙尘暴。这些问题在干旱地区脆弱的生态平衡和绿洲在支持当地人口和经济中的关键作用下变得更加严重。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What are the consequences of applying rigorous data screening criteria on the reliability and usability of data collected from oasis–desert areas?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 对来自绿洲-沙漠地区收集的数据应用严格的数据筛选标准，会对数据的可靠性和可用性产生什么影响？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: Applying rigorous data screening criteria, such as those used in the cosmic ray observation system, can enhance the reliability of the dataset by ensuring that only high-quality data are retained. This can lead to more accurate interpretations of energy, water vapor, and carbon exchanges in oasis–desert areas, thereby improving the understanding of ecological stability and socioeconomic development in these regions.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 应用严格的数据筛选标准，例如在宇宙射线观测系统中使用的标准，可以提高数据集的可靠性，确保仅保留高质量的数据。这可以导致对绿洲-沙漠地区能量、水汽和碳交换的更准确解释，从而改善对这些地区生态稳定性和社会经济发展的理解。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: How does the integration of long-term observational datasets impact the understanding of energy, water vapor, and carbon exchanges in oasis–desert ecosystems?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 长期观测数据集的整合如何影响对绿洲-沙漠生态系统中能量、水汽和碳交换的理解？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: The integration of long-term observational datasets allows for a comprehensive understanding of the dynamics of energy, water vapor, and carbon exchanges in oasis–desert ecosystems. These datasets provide essential insights into the interactions between oasis and desert systems, supporting ecological security and sustainable development goals in arid regions.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 长期观测数据集的整合使我们能够全面理解绿洲-沙漠生态系统中能量、水汽和碳交换的动态。这些数据集为绿洲与沙漠系统之间的相互作用提供了重要的见解，支持干旱地区的生态安全和可持续发展目标。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: Why is it important to develop a comprehensive dataset for observing cosmic rays in arid regions like the Heihe River Basin?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 在像黑河流域这样的干旱地区，开发一个全面的宇宙射线观测数据集是重要的原因是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: Developing a comprehensive dataset for observing cosmic rays in arid regions like the Heihe River Basin is crucial for understanding the interactions between energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis–desert ecosystems. This knowledge supports the ecological security and sustainable development of these areas, which are vital for the local population and environment.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 在像黑河流域这样的干旱地区开发一个全面的宇宙射线观测数据集，对于理解能量、水汽和碳交换在绿洲-沙漠生态系统中的相互作用至关重要。这一知识支持这些地区的生态安全和可持续发展，对当地人口和环境至关重要。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What is the significance of implementing stringent data processing and quality control measures in the collection of hydrometeorological data?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 在收集水文气象数据时，实施严格的数据处理和质量控制措施的重要性是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: Implementing stringent data processing and quality control measures in the collection of hydrometeorological data is significant to ensure the accuracy and reliability of the data. This is essential for a quantitative understanding of energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange, which is necessary to maintain a balance between oasis and desert systems and achieve sustainable development goals.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 实施严格的数据处理和质量控制措施以收集水文气象数据，对于确保数据的准确性和可靠性至关重要。这对于定量理解能量、水汽和碳的交换是必要的，这对于维持绿洲与沙漠系统之间的平衡以及实现可持续发展目标至关重要。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: Why focus on obtaining long-term observational data in artificial and natural oasis–desert systems?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 为什么要关注在人工和自然绿洲–沙漠系统中获取长期观测数据？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: Focusing on obtaining long-term observational data in artificial and natural oasis–desert systems is important to capture the dynamic interactions and changes in these ecosystems over time. This long-term data is indispensable for recognizing oasis–desert interactions, protecting ecological stability, and supporting socioeconomic development in arid and semiarid regions.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 在人工和自然绿洲-沙漠系统中获取长期观测数据非常重要，以捕捉这些生态系统随时间变化的动态互动和变化。这些长期数据对于识别绿洲-沙漠之间的相互作用、保护生态稳定性以及支持干旱和半干旱地区的社会经济发展是不可或缺的。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What are the critical steps involved in processing and correcting cosmic ray data to derive soil moisture content in arid and semi-arid regions?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 处理和校正宇宙射线数据以推导干旱和半干旱地区土壤水分含量的关键步骤包括：
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: The processing of cosmic ray data to derive soil moisture content involves several critical steps: data screening based on voltage, relative humidity, sampling time intervals, and neutron count variability; pressure correction using the fast neutron pressure correction formula; and instrument calibration to determine N0, the fast neutron count under dry soil conditions, by comparing measured soil moisture with corrected neutron data.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 处理宇宙射线数据以推导土壤湿度含量涉及几个关键步骤：根据电压、相对湿度、采样时间间隔和中子计数变异性进行数据筛选；使用快速中子压力修正公式进行压力修正；以及仪器校准，通过将测得的土壤湿度与修正后的中子数据进行比较，确定N0，即干燥土壤条件下的快速中子计数。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: How are long-term observations of energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange collected and processed in oasis–desert ecosystems to ensure data quality and reliability?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 在绿洲-沙漠生态系统中，如何收集和处理能量、水蒸气和碳交换的长期观测数据，以确保数据的质量和可靠性？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: Long-term observations of energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis–desert ecosystems are collected using eddy covariance systems, scintillometers, and automatic weather stations. Data processing includes data collection, processing, and archiving with quality control procedures to ensure reliable datasets, supplemented by hydrometeorological, vegetation, and soil parameters.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 对绿洲-沙漠生态系统的能量、水汽和碳交换进行长期观测，使用涡度协方差系统、闪烁仪和自动气象站。数据处理包括数据收集、处理和归档，并采用质量控制程序以确保数据集的可靠性，辅以水文气象、植被和土壤参数。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What methodologies are implemented to ensure the accuracy and completeness of hydrometeorological data from automatic weather stations in arid regions?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 为了确保干旱地区自动气象站的水文气象数据的准确性和完整性，实施了哪些方法论？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: To ensure accuracy and completeness of hydrometeorological data, methodologies include using high-frequency measurements from automatic weather stations, with data averaged over 10-minute periods. Quality control involves data screening, processing, and archiving, alongside supplementary data on groundwater tables, vegetation, and soil parameters.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 为了确保水文气象数据的准确性和完整性，方法包括使用自动气象站的高频测量数据，并将数据平均为10分钟的时间段。质量控制涉及数据筛选、处理和归档，以及关于地下水位、植被和土壤参数的补充数据。

Enablement.QuestionEn: What methodologies enable the accurate collection of data on energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in arid oasis–desert areas?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 哪些方法能够准确收集干旱绿洲-沙漠地区的能量、水蒸气和碳交换数据？
Enablement.AnswerEn: In the field above, a suite of observational datasets from artificial and natural oasis–desert systems is collected. The methodologies include long-term observations using eddy covariance systems and scintillometers for turbulent flux data, and automatic weather stations for hydrometeorological data, which involve radiation, soil heat flux, temperature profiles, and more. These methods provide a quantitative understanding of oasis–desert interactions, crucial for ecological stability and development.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 在上述领域，收集了一套来自人工和自然绿洲–沙漠系统的观测数据集。方法包括使用涡度协方差系统和闪烁仪进行湍流通量数据的长期观测，以及自动气象站收集水文气象数据，这些数据涉及辐射、土壤热通量、温度剖面等。这些方法提供了对绿洲–沙漠相互作用的定量理解，对于生态稳定性和发展至关重要。

Enablement.QuestionEn: How do data correction techniques enable the extraction of accurate soil moisture content from cosmic-ray neutron data in agricultural settings?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 数据校正技术如何使从宇宙射线中子数据中提取准确的土壤湿度含量在农业环境中成为可能？
Enablement.AnswerEn: The data correction techniques mentioned involve pressure correction of fast neutron counts and calibration to calculate soil moisture content. The process includes filtering data based on specific criteria such as atmospheric conditions and voltage levels, followed by using pressure correction formulas and soil sample calibration to determine the neutron count under dry soil conditions, which is then used to derive soil moisture content.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 提到的数据修正技术包括对快中子计数的压力修正和校准，以计算土壤水分含量。该过程包括根据特定标准（如大气条件和电压水平）过滤数据，随后使用压力修正公式和土壤样本校准来确定干土条件下的中子计数，然后利用该计数推导土壤水分含量。

Enablement.QuestionEn: What resources or conditions enable the establishment of long-term observational networks in semiarid inland river basins?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 哪些资源或条件能够促进半干旱内陆河流域长期观测网络的建立？
Enablement.AnswerEn: The establishment of long-term observational networks in semiarid inland river basins is enabled by installing multiple land surface flux and meteorological stations, including superstations and ordinary stations. These networks, collecting data since 2012, benefit from access to water resources from the cryosphere in upper regions and comprehensive data collection covering energy, water vapor, and carbon exchanges, as well as auxiliary vegetation and soil parameters.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 在半干旱内陆河流域建立长期观测网络的工作得以通过安装多个陆面通量和气象站点，包括超级站和普通站来实现。这些网络自2012年以来收集数据，受益于来自上游地区冰冻圈的水资源，并全面收集能量、水蒸气和碳交换的数据，以及辅助的植被和土壤参数。

Expectation.QuestionEn: What challenges might arise from using high-frequency hydrometeorological data for understanding long-term trends in oasis–desert ecosystems?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 使用高频水文气象数据来理解绿洲-沙漠生态系统的长期趋势可能会面临哪些挑战？
Expectation.AnswerEn: Given the ecological crisis of inland river basins, including the frequent occurrence of dust storms and land degradation, high-frequency data might not adequately capture long-term trends without comprehensive data processing and quality control.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 鉴于内陆河流流域的生态危机，包括频繁发生的沙尘暴和土地退化，高频数据可能无法充分捕捉长期趋势，除非进行全面的数据处理和质量控制。

Expectation.QuestionEn: Why might it be challenging to develop a comprehensive dataset that includes both natural and artificial oasis–desert systems?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 开发一个包含自然和人工绿洲-沙漠系统的综合数据集可能面临哪些挑战？
Expectation.AnswerEn: The need for a quantitative understanding of energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange involves complexities such as balancing oasis and desert systems for sustainable development, which requires extensive and well-coordinated data collection from both natural and artificial systems.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 对能量、水蒸气和碳交换的定量理解的需求涉及复杂性，例如平衡绿洲和沙漠系统以实现可持续发展，这需要对自然和人工系统进行广泛且协调的数据收集。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: How adequate are the current data collection methods in capturing the complex dynamics of energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis–desert ecosystems?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 当前的数据收集方法在捕捉绿洲-沙漠生态系统中能量、水蒸气和碳交换的复杂动态方面有多充分？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: The data collection methods, which include long-term observational datasets from artificial and natural oasis–desert systems, appear comprehensive. They utilize eddy covariance systems and scintillometers for half-hourly turbulent flux data, as well as automatic weather stations for hydrometeorological data with a 10 min average period. These methods seem adequate in capturing the complex dynamics, as they incorporate a wide array of parameters, including energy, water vapor, carbon and methane fluxes, and various auxiliary data involving hydrometeorology, vegetation, and soil parameters.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 数据收集方法包括来自人工和自然绿洲-沙漠系统的长期观测数据集，似乎非常全面。它们利用涡度协方差系统和闪烁仪获取半小时的湍流通量数据，以及自动气象站获取10分钟平均的水文气象数据。这些方法似乎足以捕捉复杂的动态，因为它们涵盖了广泛的参数，包括能量、水蒸气、碳和甲烷通量，以及涉及水文气象、植被和土壤参数的各种辅助数据。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: What are the potential challenges in maintaining the accuracy and reliability of datasets involving oasis–desert energy and carbon flux observations?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 在维护涉及绿洲-沙漠能量和碳通量观测的数据集的准确性和可靠性时，可能面临的挑战包括：
Judgmental.AnswerEn: Potential challenges in maintaining accuracy and reliability include dealing with ecological environment degradation, such as river drying, vegetation degradation, intensification of land desertification, and dust storms. These environmental challenges, especially in inland river basins like the Tarim River basin and others along the Silk Road, may impact observational accuracy and data consistency.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 维护准确性和可靠性面临的潜在挑战包括应对生态环境退化，如河流干涸、植被退化、土地沙漠化加剧和沙尘暴等。这些环境挑战，特别是在塔里木河流域和丝绸之路沿线的内陆河流域，可能会影响观测的准确性和数据的一致性。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I'm unsure how data collection methods in oasis–desert ecosystems account for both natural and artificial systems.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我不确定在绿洲-沙漠生态系统中，数据收集方法如何同时考虑自然系统和人工系统。
Assertion.AnswerEn: In oasis–desert ecosystems, data collection methods involve long-term observations and datasets that include energy, water vapor, carbon, and methane fluxes, as well as auxiliary data involving hydrometeorology, vegetation, and soil parameters. These datasets are collected using an eddy covariance system, scintillometer, and automatic weather stations, supplemented with groundwater table data.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 在绿洲-沙漠生态系统中，数据收集方法涉及长期观察和数据集，包括能量、水蒸气、碳和甲烷通量，以及涉及水文气象、植被和土壤参数的辅助数据。这些数据集是通过涡度协方差系统、闪烁仪和自动气象站收集的，并辅以地下水位数据。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I don't understand the challenges faced when collecting data on energy and water vapor exchange in arid regions.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我不理解在干旱地区收集能量和水蒸气交换数据时面临的挑战。
Assertion.AnswerEn: Arid regions face ecological degradation challenges such as drying rivers and lakes, vegetation degradation, land desertification, and dust storms. These environmental crises complicate data collection efforts, particularly in inland river basins along the Silk Road, making it crucial to maintain long-term observation systems.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 干旱地区面临生态退化的挑战，如河流和湖泊干涸、植被退化、土地沙漠化以及沙尘暴。这些环境危机使得数据收集工作变得复杂，特别是在丝绸之路沿线的内陆河流流域，因此维护长期观测系统显得尤为重要。
